about_the_game:
The village of Kale Bay is devoid of most human customs, but David has brought along some that have caught on. Watching old human movies and TV shows, incorporating human slang into the dialect.... but none so important as bringing along the holiday of Halloween.

Residents of Kale Bay don't generally venture outside of the village boundaries, but the few that have.... report strange sightings of a crazed monster, moving among the trees. Is it stalking them? Is it merely curious? No one knows. In secret, however, the mayor has enlisted a hunter of the night to find and slay this beast.

We're not saying that you get to romance a Werewolf. Don't go into this DLC expecting to romance a Werewolf.

(You can romance a Werewolf)

  • Three new characters that can be romanced
  • An entirely new chapter: October
  • New endgame results based on what you said to people during the October chapter. These will not affect the base game and are purely cosmetic.

TO PLAY


- Simply install the DLC. You will meet the new residents of Kale Bay before the end of the first month as well as unlock a new chapter, October.
